Class JdkSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.core.serialize.JdkSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectSerializer

    public class JdkSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObjectSerializer
    A ObjectSerializer that uses JDK serialization.

    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
